docs.title: Hello, I'm Jovan Vunić 👋
docs.text:
M. Sc. in Applied Computer Science and Informatics Engineering Stuff Since 2019

Always open for new ideas and ways of thinking.

Beyond coding, I enjoy reading books on various topics along a good cup of coffee, in addition to traveling and meeting other cultures.

Check out my hobby projects and let's connect !

docs.title: Contact
docs.text:
Based in Vienna, Austria and open to:

  • On-site and/or hybrid opportunities in Vienna/Austria
  • Remote work worldwide
  • Occasional travel for projects

I'm always open to discussing new opportunities, collaborations, or just having a chat about technology.

Feel free to reach out!

vunicjovan@gmail.com

LinkedIn

GitHub

docs.title: Professional Experience
docs.text:
Experienced engineer with a strong professional background and a passion for turning innovative ideas into scalable and platform-independent solutions. Highly adaptable to any given environment, technology, or organizational structure.

Experienced in working with diverse development approaches and architectural styles. No stranger to Machine Learning, Data Science, or High Performance Computing concepts. Always eager to learn more while perfecting the previously gathered knowledge.

Communication has never been a problem for me – on the contrary, I hold it as the most important prerequisite of successful collaboration. Hence I am open for discussions on both technical and non-technical topics at all times.

  • 📍 Currently working at Adverity GmbH as Senior Full-Stack Engineer | Vienna, Austria
  • 💡 Expertise: Back-End Development / Full-Stack Development / Data Engineering / Data Analysis / Process Automation
  • 💬 Passionate about: Emerging techonologies / Machine Learning / Process Automation / Everything Related To Data

Over time, I became multilingual - and I develop further in this area with each day:

Serbian Native

Bosnian Croatian Montenegrin Professional

English Professional

German Advanced

Italian Beginner

Spanish Beginner

docs.title: Personal Projects
docs.text:
Actively Developed Projects 2Completed Projects 3Published Tools 1

A monolithic platform to be used primarily for vehicle rent/sale advertisements, with potential of expanding into other categories.

Python Django DRF React TypeScript PostgreSQL Docker Just

View on GitHub

A hobby project meant to represent an overview of books read in the past years.

Python Rio TinyDB UV

View on GitHub

Rent-a-Car application with microservices architecture.

This university project resembles a team effort and it involved building 10+ microservice applications, as well as a standalone client consumer application.

Moreover, a couple of microservice-related design patterns and inter-service communicational patterns were applied to different portions of the platform, including message queueing via RabbitMQ and SOAP-based exchanges.

Java Spring Boot Vue.js Docker Maven PostgreSQL RabbitMQ

View on GitHub

A simple HTTP server that provides weather data for cities via REST API.

Built as a proof-of-concept for research on how to build standalone, custom servers with Python's Standard Library.

Python http.server

View on GitHub

A minimal Python project demonstrating a simple PyTorch workflow:

  • Synthetic data generation
  • Train-test split
  • Model training
  • Model saving/loading
  • Basic visualization with Matplotlib

Python UV PyTorch Matplotlib

View on GitHub

A Python library for crawling and analyzing file system hierarchies.

Rich File System Metadata

  • File and directory size tracking with aggregation
  • Modification and access timestamps
  • File permissions and security attributes
  • MIME type detection
  • File hash calculation (SHA256) for duplicate detection

Multiple Export Formats

  • Interactive HTML visualization with expandable tree view
  • JSON export for structured data analysis
  • CSV export for spreadsheet compatibility

Python UV

View on GitHub
